LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_AteCheese.stages.0.desc: I ate some cheese. I guess it tastes alright, but I'd prefer some crunchy roasted nuts or juicy berries.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_AteCheese.stages.1.desc: I ate some more cheese. I'm starting to get sick of this.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_AteCorpse.stages.0.desc: I had to eat the flesh of a dead creature without even butchering or cooking it, like a filthy, primitive rat.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_AteHumanlikeMeatAsIngre: Huh. Who knew cooked smoothskin meat tastes like pork tenderloin?
Ew, it tastes like raw pork!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_AteKibble.stages.0.desc: I had to eat animal kibble, like a filthy, primitive rat.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_AteMousekinMeatAsIngred: My meal was made from the cooked meat of my brethren! Valerian forgive me, for I have sinned!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_AteMousekinMeatDirect.s: I ate the raw flesh of my brethren! Valerian forgive me, for I have sinned!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_AteRawFood.stages.0.des: I had to eat raw food. We should be cooking that kind of food before eating it. We're not filthy, primitive rats.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_AteTrailMix.stages.0.de: I love trail mix! Crunchy nuts, chewy dried berries, yummy popcorn!
I had to eat a meal off the ground, like a filthy, primitive rat. Can't we get a joiner to make us a proper table?
May they grow the biggest and most beautiful garden together!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_ButcheredHumanCorpse.st: Huh, these smoothskins have such strange bones and meat.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_ButcheredMousekinCorpse: I butchered up one of our brethren like an animal. Now I'll never be allowed into The Great Garden!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_ColonistLeftUnburied.st: One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. We should give them a proper burial, or their soul will never reach The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_DrankChonkoNutBrew.stag: Mmm, delicious! I feel so much more awake already!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_FaithAffinityOpinions.s: shared faith in The Great Garden
shared faith in The Great Garden
shared faith in The Great Garden
shared faith in The Great Garden
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_GotMarried.stages.0.des: I got married! May we grow the biggest and most beautiful garden together!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_KnowBuriedInSarcophagus: We buried someone in an ornamented sarcophagus. May their soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_KnowButcheredHumanCorps: We butchered up a smoothskin. Apparently, they have really tiny ears, stiff ribs and long leg bones. How do they hear anything, squeeze through small gaps, and not fall over all the time?
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_KnowButcheredMousekinCo: We butchered up one of our brethren like an animal. Now we'll never be allowed into The Great Garden!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_KnowColonistDied.stages: May their soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_KnowColonistExecuted.st: A guilty colonist was executed. May Valerian the Wise be merciful and grant them a place in The Great Garden.
A colonist was euthanized. May their soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
A colonist was killed in cold blood. Their blood is on our paws.
A colonist died because we cut them up for body parts. Our souls will be damned to The Wasteland!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_KnowColonistOrganHarves: We cut up one of our own for body parts. Our souls will be damned to The Wasteland!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_KnowGuestExecuted.stage: A guilty prisoner or guest was executed. May Valerian the Wise be merciful and grant them a place in The Great Garden.
A prisoner or guest was euthanized. May their soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
A prisoner or guest was killed in cold blood. Their blood is on our paws.
A prisoner or guest died because we cut them up for body parts. Our souls will be damned to The Wasteland!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_KnowGuestOrganHarvested: We cut up a guest or prisoner for body parts. Our souls will be damned to The Wasteland!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MissingEars.stages.0.de: I had to get my missing ear replaced with a cloth prosthetic. I hope nobody else notices.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MissingEars.stages.1.de: I had to get both my missing ears replaced with cloth prosthetics. I hope nobody else notices.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MissingEars.stages.2.de: I've lost one of my ears. This is humiliating!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MissingEars.stages.3.la: One prosthetic and one missing ear
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MissingEars.stages.3.de: I've lost both my ears, but only one was replaced with a cloth prosthetic. This is humiliating!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MissingEars.stages.4.de: I've lost both my ears! I'd rather die than live with this humiliation!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyAuntDied.stages.0.des: My aunt died. May her soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
My brother died. May his soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyCousinDied.stages.0.d: My cousin died. May their soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyDaughterDied.stages.0: My poor, poor baby! I should've taken better care of you!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyFatherDied.stages.0.d: My father died. May his soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyFianceDied.stages.0.d: My fiance died. We promised we'd grow our garden together!
My fiancée died. We promised we'd grow our garden together!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyGrandchildDied.stages: My grandchild died. Our family's future, taken away from us forever...
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyGrandparentDied.stage: My grandparent died. May their soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyHalfSiblingDied.stage: My half-sibling died. May their soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
My husband is dead. May we be reunited in The Great Garden someday.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyKinDied.stages.0.desc: My kin died. May their soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyMotherDied.stages.0.d: My mother died. May her soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyNieceDied.stages.0.de: My niece died. May her soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyNephewDied.stages.0.d: My nephew died. May her soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyOrganHarvested.stages: The colony's cutting me up for parts! Damn you all to The Wasteland!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MySisterDied.stages.0.d: My sister died. May her soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MySonDied.stages.0.desc: My poor, poor baby! I should've taken better care of you!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyUncleDied.stages.0.de: My uncle died. May her soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_MyWifeDied.stages.0.des: My wife is dead. May we be reunited in The Great Garden someday.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_NeedRoomSize.stages.0.d: Squeak, somebody let me out of here!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_NeedRoomSize.stages.1.d: Nice and cosy, snug as a burrow!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_NeedRoomSize.stages.2.d: So much space, we can hold a town meeting in here!
Serves them right. May they rot in The Wasteland forever!
Serves them right. I hope they never come back, and wander in The Wasteland forever!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_PawnWithGoodOpinionDied: Such a wonderful person. May their soul rest forever in The Great Garden.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_PawnWithGoodOpinionLost: Such a wonderful person, lost. I hope they will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_ReleasedHealthyPrisoner: We released a healthy prisoner. Valerian the Wise would be proud we followed his teachings of mercy.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_ReligiousDisgustAtOwnAr: I hate having this unnatural thing attached to me. It goes against my faith.
These artificial parts are violating the sanctity of my body!
My flesh has been defiled by all these artificial parts! Now I'll never be allowed into The Great Garden!
This witchcraft taints my body! Get it off me!
More witchcraft, polluting my pure, natural flesh!
My flesh has been defiled by all this witchcraft! I'm no better than those heretics!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_SleptInCold.stages.0.de: I had to sleep in the cold. We should get a fireplace going.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_SleptInHeat.stages.0.de: I had to sleep in unbearable heat. Can't we have some ventilation around here?
I had to sleep on the ground like a filthy, primitive rat.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_SleptOutside.stages.0.d: I had to sleep outdoors without any protection from the elements, like a filthy, primitive rat.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_WearingMousekinFurAppar: I'm wearing clothes made from the fur of my brethren! Valerian forgive me, for I have sinned!
LanguageData.Mousekin_Thought_WearingPudgemouseFurApp: I'm wearing clothes made from the fur of a pudgemouse. That poor innocent creature didn't deserve this!
